      • checkBust

        public boolean checkBust​(java.util.Scanner sc,
                         BlackjackPlayer currentPlayer,
                         Hand hand,
                         Player player)
        Check if current player is busted (hand value is over 21)
        Parameters:
        sc - Scanner object to pass on to continuePlaying method for player input
        currentPlayer - BlackjackPlayer object, instanceof Player or Dealer
        hand - Hand object for currentPlayer
        player - Player object for human player
        Returns:
        boolean value of whether currentPlayer has been busted

        currentPlayer - BlackjackPlayer object, instanceof Player or Dealer
        hand - Hand object for currentPlayer
        player - Player object for human player
